FarmImprovement_Initial_Question: Pssst... hey, mainlander. Listen up. If you've got coin... me and my boys can improve your farm. Interested?
FarmImprovement_Farm_Expansion_Question: I can get my boys to add a little extra space on your farm. It'll just be... {{price}}g. What do you say?
FarmImprovement_Sprinkler_Question: I can get my boys to improve the sand, allowing you to use sprinklers.  I'll just need {{price}}g. What do you say?
FarmImprovement_Done_Tomorrow: Heh heh heh... perfect. You can expect the changes tomorrow morning.
